Player History
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1967, hitting .383 with 8 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1967, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1967, hitting .351 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1968, hitting .383 with 7 HR, 20 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/13/1969...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 5/30/1969...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Traded from Oakland to Los Angeles on 7/21/1969 (Going to LA: LF K. Harrelson. Going to OAK: 2B T. Sizemore)...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/22/1972, hitting .438 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 9/28/1973...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/7/1976 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
